71 void callback(const ImConstPtr& im1, const ImConstPtr& im2)

79  cv_ptr2 = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(im2, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
80  }

83  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());

86 
87  imgs[0] = Mat(cv_ptr1->image).clone();

160  Ptr<Stitcher> stitcher = Stitcher::create(mode, try_use_gpu);
161  stitcher->setRegistrationResol(-1); // 0.6
162  stitcher->setSeamEstimationResol(-1); // 0.1
163  stitcher->setCompositingResol(-1); //1
164  stitcher->setPanoConfidenceThresh(-1); //1
165  stitcher->setWaveCorrection(true);
166  stitcher->setWaveCorrectKind(detail::WAVE_CORRECT_HORIZ);
167  Stitcher::Status status = stitcher->stitch(imgs, pano);
168  if (status != Stitcher::OK)
169  {
170  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Can't stitch images, error code = " << status);
171  return;
172  }
173 
174  // Publish
175  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "bgr8", pano).toImageMsg();
176  pubout.publish(msg);
177 }
178 
179 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
180 {
181  // parsing arguments
182 
183  string node_name;
184  name_cam1 = argv[1];
185  name_cam2 = argv[2];
186  name = name_cam1 + "_" + name_cam2;
187  node_name = "stitching_" + name;
188  string target_topic = argv[3];
189 
190  // Initialize ROS
191  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
192  ros::NodeHandle nh;
193  ros::NodeHandle node_stitch("/calib/" + name + "/stitching");
194 
195  listener = new tf::TransformListener;
196  br = new tf::TransformBroadcaster;
197 
198  // Synchronize both kinects messages
199  message_filters::Subscriber<Image_t> cam1(nh, "/" + name_cam1 + "/hd/image_color", 1);
200  message_filters::Subscriber<Image_t> cam2(nh, "/" + name_cam2 + "/hd/image_color", 1);
201  typedef sync_policies::ApproximateTime<Image_t, Image_t> KinectSync;
202  Synchronizer<KinectSync> sync(KinectSync(10), cam1, cam2);
203  sync.registerCallback(boost::bind(&callback, _1, _2));
204 
205  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
206  pub1 = it.advertise("/calib/images/" + name_cam1, 1);
207  pub2 = it.advertise("/calib/images/" + name_cam2, 1);
208  pubout = it.advertise("/calib/images/" + name, 1);
209 
210  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::StitchConfig> server(node_stitch);
211  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::StitchConfig>::CallbackType f;
212  f = boost::bind(&conf_callback, _1, _2);
213  server.setCallback(f);
214 
215  // ROS loop
216  while (ros::ok())
217  {
218 
219  // sleep
220  if (frequency > 0)
221  {
222  ros::Rate loop_rate(frequency);
223  loop_rate.sleep();
224  ros::spinOnce();
225  }
226  else
227  {
228  ros::spin();
229  }
230  }
231 
232  return 0;
233 }
